title: Australian diary. No. 058
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: champagne is the aristocrat of Australian wines; deep-sea prawns (Kings and Tigers) are a new seafood harvest; dogs perform a high dive act; racing pigeons make fascinating pets and the manufacture of small arms requires skill and precision.
